name: Midos Escape
description:
Gameplay footage in the description.

Made for the #1 UDH Game Jam, work in progress, only infinite mode is currently available and only one weapon which has 3 levels, the difficulty of infinite mode increases with time, becoming almost impossible if you play it for 1 hour, the difficulty also depends on your weapon level. Score is calculated based on kills, hits taken, and exp received.

For now, only 800x600 is supported.

https://i.imgur.com/9ZGE9KC.mp4
